New Records: Lionel Messi broke the all-time record for Copa América minutes played.
Key Match Events: Emiliano Martinez made two crucial saves in the penalty shootout.
Nicolas Otamendi clinched the penalty shootout victory for Argentina.
Jordy Caicedo missed a header that could have won the match for Ecuador but redeemed himself in the penalty shootout.
Gonzalo Montiel scored a penalty for Argentina.
John Yeboah scored a penalty for Ecuador.
Alexis Mac Allister scored a penalty for Argentina.
Julian Álvarez scored the first penalty of the shootout for Argentina.
Lionel Messi missed a penalty in the shootout.
Kevin Rodriguez scored a dramatic header to tie the match for Ecuador in stoppage time.
Lisandro Martinez scored the first goal for Argentina with a header.
Enner Valencia missed a penalty for Ecuador.
Enzo Fernández missed three clear chances for Argentina in the first half.
Enner Valencia received the first yellow card of the match for a hard tackle on Alexis Mac Allister.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at NRG Stadium in Houston.
There is no extra time in Copa América knockouts until the final.
